ModMetaData.name: Equipment Deterioration
ModMetaData.author: LimeTreeSnake
ModMetaData.description:
1.0 (2018-11-15) Do you think it's odd that your clothes crumbles to dust whilst those berries and other utilities are safe from those harmfull pockets? That your trusted gun does not break down whilst being carried?
Then this mod is for you!
This mod makes sure that everything your pawn carries gets smushed with time!
Special Thanks to: Jecrell and Pardeike
Planned: Modifiable deterioration rate.
